flawed_nl_solution:
Shelly made 6 /2 = <<6/2=3>>3 friends from after-school clubs.
She made 6 + 3 = <<6+3=13>>13 new friends at school this year.
Shelly will need 13 * 12 = <<13*12=156>>156 inches of thread to make each friend a keychain.
#### 156

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
